about.description1: Tatry Home Apartment is located in a quiet highland cottage neighborhood in Ko≈õcielisko. It is 1.5 km from Chocho≈Çowska Valley and 2 km from Ko≈õcieliska Valley. Popular ski lifts like Szymoszkowa are just a 5-minute drive away. A bus stop is located at the main gate. For younger guests, there is a playground available.
about.description2: From the apartment balcony, you can enjoy a beautiful panorama of the Tatra Mountains on clear days. The apartment has 72m2. On the first level, there are two bedrooms (one of which is a walk-through), a living room with a kitchen, and a bathroom. The first bedroom has a large double bed. The second bedroom has two single beds. The living room features a large fold-out sofa. The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator with freezer, microwave, induction cooktop, dishwasher, and a large selection of kitchen utensils. The bathroom has a shower, sink, and washing machine. In the mezzanine, there is another bedroom with two single beds. We invite you to stay with us!
